metadata.description: Official HashiCorp plugins and skills for Claude Code

plugins.name: terraform-code-generation
plugins.description: Terraform code generation skills including HCL generation, style guides, and testing.

plugins.name: terraform-module-generation
plugins.description: Terraform module generation and refactoring skills including module design and Terraform Stacks.

plugins.name: terraform-provider-development
plugins.description: Terraform provider development skills including resources, data sources, actions, and acceptance testing.

plugins.name: packer-builders
plugins.description: Packer builder skills for AWS, Azure, and Windows image creation.

plugins.name: packer-hcp
plugins.description: HCP Packer registry integration for tracking and managing image metadata.
